title: Man I like how I lose any time they have a Morgana.
body: But she was ONLY pick or ban for 5 years because she's so fun, right? Not at ALL broken or anything!

replies.body: Morgana was pick or ban when, exactly?
Season 1 through early season 5, actually. There's a reason she has one of the first Victorious skins.
Inaccuracy aside, this is relevant as we approach season 9..?

> [{quoted}](name=Konotori,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=REhRUg7k,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-05-02T01:23:59.193+0000)
>
> Season 1 through early season 5, actually. There's a reason she has one of the first Victorious skins.

what
Position a minion between you and her and sheâ€™ll never land her Q on you...

And just ignore the fact she has guaranteed poke that resets every time it hits you or a cannon minion, on top of her shield that makes her ADC basically unkillable, and her ult that instawins any teamfight. 

Yeah it's just her Q.

> [{quoted}](name=Konotori,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=REhRUg7k,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-05-02T01:25:00.034+0000)
>
> And just ignore the fact she has guaranteed poke that resets every time it hits you or a cannon minion, on top of her shield that makes her ADC basically unkillable, and her ult that instawins any teamfight. 
> 
> Yeah it's just her Q.

Her E only blocks magic damage and crowd control, not physical damage. If your support has cc and Morgana uses her E on the ADC then CC Morgana and punish the adc for going in.
How could anyone complain about Morgana in season 8 XD idk its funny
Seriously, don't you get tired of just making these shitposts?
